text: Man in the Moon is the eighth studio album by Nektar and was originally released in 1980 as a German only release. This album continues the commercial hard rock with elements of progressive rock explored on their previous effort Magic Is a Child. This album features the return of founding member Roye Albrighton. The album was expanded to include previously unreleased tracks and re-issued by Voiceprint in Europe. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== * Roye Albrighton - Guitar, lead vocals * Carmine Rojas - bass, backing vocals * Allan "Taff" Freeman - keyboards, backing vocals * David Prater - drums, percussion ==References== ==External links== * Man in the Moon at TheNektarProject.com Category:Nektar albums Category:1980 albums
title: Man in the Moon (Nektar album)
